basics.name: Zeyao Zhou
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a sophomore student studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Assistant in Program & Course Implementation in the UHM Catalog
highlights: Assists the Catalog Office with creating, modifying, and proofreading courses,
degree requirements, and 4-year plans on the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa catalog.
